item.title: Police hunt for the gunman who killed UnitedHealthcareâ€™s boss in Manhattan
item.description: Investigators are searching for clues that could help them identify the masked gunman who killed the leader of one of the largest U.S. health insurance companies on a Manhattan sidewalk, then disappeared into Central Park.
